channel.title: How will be watching the rugby world cup this year?
channel.description:
i was just wondering if many people will be watching the rugby world cup this year. i no americans arnt realli into rugby but i am sure there are alot of new zealanders aussies and people form the uk that will be watching it.
if you are watching it who do you think will win?
my money is on new zealand(not just cos i come from there :P) cos they hold the belidislode(spelt that wrong) and the tri-nations cup.
any way post here if you are going to watch it an who u think will win

item.title: How will be watching the rugby world cup this year?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:133465”]rugby is football …?

They name it like old people play it…[/quote]

It’s like football except the whistle doesn’t blow every 10 seconds.

I find rugby much more fun to play then football. I don’t think I’m interested in watching it though. The only sport I watch is hockey and golf.
